title: Flutter Developer
tagsAndSkills: Analytical skills,User interface designing,android testing,Testing tools,Analytical,Javascript,Android SDK,Mobile applications
jobDescription:
• Cross-platform mobile app developers who have developed mobile apps with a familiarity of Flutter
  • Participation in the process of analysis, designing, implementation and testing of new apps.
  • Mobile app design and optimization, able to provide a solution to improve mobile app quality, understand emerging technologies, standards and best practices to bring mobile app product to the next level
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies and frameworks to maximize development efficiency
  • Estimate timelines and deliver as per schedule
  • Solid knowledge of mobile app development practices, along with mobile testing tools and techniques
  • Expertise in optimizing the app for performance

Requirements:

  • Should have worked and successfully deployed apps using Flutter framework
  • Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
  • Experience in API integration.
  • Strong knowledge of Flutter and how to deal with different screen sizes.
  • Addon knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android
  • Familiarity with REST API
  • Sound knowledge in JavaScript
  • Strong knowledge of UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
  • Understanding of Google s Android design principles and interface guidelines
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Gitlab.
  • Experienced in Flutter for App development
  • 1-2 years of experience and a track record in building Mobile Applications
  • Ability to build an application from scratch
  • A great eye for detail and design

Core skills required:

  • Solution finder mindset
  • Strong Analytical Problem Solving Skills
  • Self-motivated
  • Fast learner

Job Type: Full-time

Experience:Flutter/dart: 1-2 yrs.

Eligibility Criteria

  • Excellent Problem Solving Analytical Skills
  • Sharp Minded
  • Fast Learner
  • Problem Solver
  • Positive attitude and mindset
  • BE - (Comp,IT)/MCA
  • Atleast 58% in Graduation/PG

title: Risk Operations Manager
tagsAndSkills: Risk Assessment,Risk Analysis,Operational Risk,Root Cause Analysis,Risk Mitigation,Control Testing,Risk Control,Risk Management
jobDescription:
Job Description:

Handle Internal audit/Inspection/Review/Operational Risk Management.

Responsible for implementation of Operational Risk Management Framework, with a specific focus on risk analysis.

1. Report to Board Level Committees as per the Operational Risk Management Framework:

2. Perform root cause analyses on identified risk events to recommend improvements to prevent these risk events from re-occurring in future.

3. Reporting and monitoring of business data for third party products distributed by the Company to Head of Risk

4. Review of Product Notes to be placed before the Governance forums

5. Review of Key Risk Disclosure documents for risky products to be offered to the clients

6. Review of due diligence carried out by the Company as a Merchant Banker in the Public Issuance transactions

7. Track various calendarized activities under the various policies of the Company, including :

a. Product and Process Approval framework

b. Corporate Business Continuity Plan

c. Record Retention Policy of the Company

d. Outsourcing Policy

4. Track various actionable of the Board Level committees and the Product and process Approval Committee

5. Create awareness for various Policies of the Company through periodic mailers / tests / other initiatives

6. Conduct reviews of various adhoc issues reported from time to time

7. Manage and prioritize work load effectively and efficiently to achieve positive results


CORE COMPETENCIES

1. Adhering to principles & values

2. Applying Expertise and Technology

3. Analysing

4. Learning & Researching

5. Formulating Strategies and Concepts

6. Entrepreneurial and Commercial Thinking
